sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.company_uid ,company.company_name ,main.certification_authority ,main.serial_number ,main.certification_year ,main.acceptance_year ,main.subsidy_amount ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM demo_company_qualification main LEFT JOIN demo_company_information company ON company.uid = main.company_uid AND company.record_status = 1 LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
